name: getmoviestatus
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool helioviewer_v1.
Tool description: Helioviewer is an open-source project for the visualization of solar and heliospheric data, funded by ESA and NASA.
API description: Fetches the status of a movie using the HelioViewer API.

is_id.description: Unique movie identifier (provided by the response to a `queueMovie` request).

verbose.description: Whether to include extra metadata in the response. Defaults to None.

callback.description: Wrap the response object in a function call of your choosing. Defaults to None.
